name: Advance Chivalry
description:
Hi this is my first game in my first GameJam !

It's a strategy and turn-based game.

The Goal ? Kill the ennemi! You will have to choose between 2 teams : The Shamans(They are very good healers) and The Mages(They can heal but they deal many damages) !

If you are Shaman then your friends will be Mage ! It's simple.

Now you have a team and a ennemi you have to know how to play...

The Knights are powerful but they are slow, the Archers are very fast but they are not very goods against the Knights.

Each class are not powerful against them (Knights are not good against Knights , Archers are not good against Archer and Mages are not good against Shamans).

-----------------------------------------------Controls------------------------------------------------

Left-click : Select a unit (you can move with the whites squares)

You can click on the swords to fight an ennemi and on the stick of heal to heal.

Right-click : Unselect a unit

E : end the turn

Escape : quit the game ☹
